areas.name: Self-actualization Needs
areas.areaAlt: Triangle section, showcasing the smallest area on top of the pyramid.
areaDetails: These include achieving one’s full potential, including any creative activities.

areas.name: Basic Needs
areas.areaAlt: Area on the right side of the pyramid, encompassing Safety and Physiological needs, at the bottom part.
areaDetails: Basic needs contain our physiological and safety needs. These are the first needs that influence behaviour.
